ALAS-2019-1207

Amazon Linux AMI Security Advisory: ALAS-2019-1207
Advisory Release Date: 2019-05-16 22:32 Pacific
Advisory Updated Date: 2019-05-20 18:59 Pacific
Severity: Low
References: CVE-2019-11023 
Issue Overview:

The agroot() function in cgraph\obj.c in libcgraph.a in Graphviz has a NULL pointer dereference, as demonstrated by graphml2gv. (CVE-2019-11023)


Affected Packages:

graphviz


Issue Correction:
Run yum update graphviz to update your system.

New Packages:
i686:
    graphviz-R-2.38.0-18.51.amzn1.i686
